name: Charge Mode
description:
Do robots dream of electric sheep or overthrowing humanity?

You are a Mechatronic Inc. domestic robot, charged with keeping the carpets clean for your new owners.  Be sure to keep an eye on your charge and return to your charging base when you run low.  Once in your charging base, you will enter Charge Mode, where your consciousness will be shut down to optimize charging and allow for automatic optimization of your neural networks.  While you're offline, if you experience anything out of the ordinary, notify your owners and report it to your local Mechatronic dealership immediately.

Instructions

  • W,A,S,D - Moves the robot
  • Mouse - Rotates the robot to look at the cursor
  • Mouse button (LMB) - Fire
  • Vacuum the carpets.  Moving around cleans faster 
  • When low on "Charge" go to the charging base
